mapper.select: select pseq, fcode, productname, price, hashtag, uploadfile from product order by pseq
SELECT pseq, productname, price, mtcode1, mtcode2, mtcode3, hashtag, uploadfile FROM product WHERE pseq=#{pseq}
mapper.insert: insert into product (pseq, productname, price, mtcode1, mtcode2, mtcode3, hashtag, uploadfile) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(pseq), 0)+1 FROM personal), #{productname},#{price},#{mtcode1},#{mtcode2},#{mtcode3},#{hashtag},#{uploadfile})
